name: Solar Smash (itch) (B0XEY1)
description:
Made for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2

(Theme: Let there be chaos)

how does it fit the theme you might ask. every 1/4 of a second more enemy's spawn and they never stop. 

try and get the best score and not die (Score does not save)

Very basic game might add more later after jam.

Let me know if you find any bugs
